'1-Pyrroline-5-carboxylic acid', also known as '1-pyrroline-5-carboxylate', 'delta-1-pyrroline-5-
carboxylic acid', and 'P5C', is an imino acid. The stereoisomer (S)-1-pyrroline-5-
carboxylate is a biosynthetic metabolite that is synthesized from proline by the
enzyme pyrroline-5-carboxylate reductase and converted into the amino acid
glutamate by the enzyme 1-pyrroline-5-carboxylate dehydrogenase.
